pp2.2:1.3: Yo kodho kujjhanā kujjhitattaṃ doso dussanā dussitattaṃ byāpatti byāpajjanā byāpajjitattaṃ virodho paṭivirodho caṇḍikkaṃ asuropo anattamanatā cittassa—
pp2.2:2.4: Yo evarūpo upanāho upanayhanā upanayhitattaṃ aṭṭhapanā ṭhapanā saṇṭhapanā anusaṃsandanā anuppabandhanā daḷhīkammaṃ kodhassa—
pp2.2:3.3: Yo makkho makkhāyanā makkhāyitattaṃ niṭṭhuriyaṃ niṭṭhuriyakammaṃ—
pp2.2:4.3: Yo paḷāso paḷāsāyanā paḷāsāyitattaṃ paḷāsāhāro vivādaṭṭhānaṃ yugaggāho appaṭinissaggo—
pp2.2:5.3: Yā paralābhasakkāragarukāramānanavandanapūjanāsu issā issāyanā issāyitattaṃ usūyā usūyanā usūyitattaṃ—
pp2.2:6.5: Yaṃ evarūpaṃ maccheraṃ maccharāyanā maccharāyitattaṃ vevicchaṃ kadariyaṃ kaṭukañcukatā aggahitattaṃ cittassa—
pp2.2:7.4: Yaṃ tattha saṭhaṃ saṭhatā sāṭheyyaṃ kakkaratā kakkariyaṃ parikkhattatā pārikkhattiyaṃ—
pp2.2:8.3: Idhekacco kāyena duccaritaṃ caritvā vācāya duccaritaṃ caritvā manasā duccaritaṃ caritvā tassa paṭicchādanahetu pāpikaṃ icchaṃ paṇidahati—
pp2.2:8.4: “mā maṃ jaññā”ti icchati, “mā maṃ jaññā”ti saṅkappati “mā maṃ jaññā”ti vācaṃ bhāsati, “mā maṃ jaññā”ti kāyena parakkamati.
pp2.2:8.5: Yā evarūpā māyā māyāvitā accāsarā vañcanā nikati vikiraṇā pariharaṇā gūhanā parigūhanā chādanā paṭicchādanā anuttānīkammaṃ anāvikammaṃ vocchādanā pāpakiriyā—
pp2.2:9.3: Yaṃ na hirīyati hiriyitabbena na hirīyati pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā—
pp2.2:10.3: Yaṃ na ottappati ottappitabbena na ottappati pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā—
pp2.2:11.3: Sahadhammike vuccamāne dovacassāyaṃ dovacassiyaṃ dovacassatā vippaṭikulaggāhitā vipaccanīkasātatā anādariyaṃ anādariyatā agāravatā appatissavatā—
pp2.2:12.3: Ye te puggalā assaddhā dussīlā appassutā maccharino duppaññā, yā tesaṃ sevanā nisevanā saṃsevanā bhajanā sambhajanā bhatti sambhatti sampavaṅkatā—
pp2.2:13.3: Idhekacco puggalo cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā nimittaggāhī hoti anubyañjanaggāhī;
pp2.2:13.4: yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ, tassa saṃvarāya na paṭipajjati, na rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ, cakkhundriye na saṃvaraṃ āpajjati.
pp2.2:13.9: manasā dhammaṃ viññāya nimittaggāhī hoti anubyañjanaggāhī;
pp2.2:13.10: yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ manindriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ, tassa saṃvarāya na paṭipajjati, na rakkhati manindriyaṃ, manindriye na saṃvaraṃ āpajjati.
pp2.2:13.11: Yā imesaṃ channaṃ indriyānaṃ agutti agopanā anārakkho asaṃvaro—
pp2.2:13.13: Imāya indriyesu aguttadvāratāya samannāgato puggalo “indriyesu aguttadvāro”.
pp2.2:14.3: Idhekacco puggalo appaṭisaṅkhā ayoniso āhāraṃ āhāreti davāya madāya maṇḍanāya vibhūsanāya, yā tattha asantuṭṭhitā amattaññutā appaṭisaṅkhā bhojane—
pp2.2:14.5: Imāya bhojane amattaññutāya samannāgato puggalo “bhojane amattaññū”.
pp2.2:15.3: Yā assati ananussati appaṭissati assati assaraṇatā adhāraṇatā pilāpanatā sammussanatā—
pp2.2:16.3: Yaṃ aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ anabhisamayo ananubodho asambodho appaṭivedho asaṅgāhaṇā apariyogāhaṇā asamapekkhaṇā apaccavekkhaṇā apaccakkhakammaṃ dummejjhaṃ bālyaṃ asampajaññaṃ moho pamoho sammoho avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ avijjālaṅgī moho akusalamūlaṃ—
pp2.2:17.3: Kāyiko vītikkamo vācasiko vītikkamo kāyikavācasiko vītikkamo—
pp2.2:18.3: “Natthi dinnaṃ, natthi yiṭṭhaṃ, natthi hutaṃ, natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko, natthi ayaṃ loko, natthi paro loko, natthi mātā, natthi pitā, natthi sattā opapātikā, natthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sammaggatā sammāpaṭipannā ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī”ti.
pp2.2:18.4: Yā evarūpā diṭṭhi diṭṭhigataṃ diṭṭhigahanaṃ diṭṭhikantāro diṭṭhivisūkāyikaṃ diṭṭhivipphanditaṃ diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ gāho paṭiggāho abhiniveso parāmāso kummaggo micchāpatho micchattaṃ titthāyatanaṃ vipariyāsaggāho, ayaṃ vuccati diṭṭhivipatti.
pp2.2:21.3: Yo kodho kujjhanā kujjhitattaṃ doso dussanā dussitattaṃ byāpatti byāpajjanā byāpajjitattaṃ virodho paṭivirodho caṇḍikkaṃ asuropo anattamanatā cittassa—
pp2.2:22.3: Pubbakālaṃ kodho aparakālaṃ upanāho yo evarūpo upanāho upanayhanā upanayhitattaṃ aṭṭhapanā ṭhapanā saṇṭhapanā anusaṃsandanā anuppabandhanā daḷhīkammaṃ kodhassa—
pp2.2:23.3: Yo makkho makkhāyanā makkhāyitattaṃ niṭṭhuriyaṃ niṭṭhuriyakammaṃ—
pp2.2:24.3: Yo paḷāso paḷāsāyanā paḷāsāyitattaṃ paḷāsāhāro vivādaṭṭhānaṃ yugaggāho appaṭinissaggo—
pp2.2:25.3: Yā paralābhasakkāragarukāramānanavandanapūjanāsu issā issāyanā issāyitattaṃ usūyā usūyanā usūyitattaṃ—
pp2.2:26.5: Yaṃ evarūpaṃ maccheraṃ maccharāyanā maccharāyitattaṃ vevicchaṃ kadariyaṃ kaṭukañcukatā aggahitattaṃ cittassa—
pp2.2:27.4: Yaṃ tattha saṭhaṃ saṭhatā sāṭheyyaṃ kakkaratā kakkariyaṃ parikkhattatā pārikkhattiyaṃ—
pp2.2:28.3: Idhekacco puggalo kāyena duccaritaṃ caritvā vācāya duccaritaṃ caritvā manasā duccaritaṃ caritvā tassa paṭicchādanahetu pāpikaṃ icchaṃ paṇidahati—
pp2.2:28.4: “mā maṃ jaññā”ti icchati, “mā maṃ jaññā”ti saṅkappati, “mā maṃ jaññā”ti vācaṃ bhāsati, “mā maṃ jaññā”ti kāyena parakkamati.
pp2.2:28.5: Yā evarūpā māyā māyāvitā accāsarā vañcanā nikati vikiraṇā pariharaṇā gūhanā parigūhanā chādanā paṭicchādanā anuttānīkammaṃ anāvikammaṃ vocchādanā pāpakiriyā—
pp2.2:29.3: Yaṃ hirīyati hiriyitabbena hirīyati pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā—
pp2.2:30.3: Yaṃ ottappati ottappitabbena ottappati pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā—
pp2.2:31.3: Sahadhammike vuccamāne sovacassāyaṃ sovacassiyaṃ sovacassatā avippaṭikulaggāhitā avipaccanīkasātatā sādariyaṃ sādariyatā sagāravatā sappatissavatā—
pp2.2:32.3: Ye te puggalā saddhā sīlavanto bahussutā cāgavanto paññavanto, yā tesaṃ sevanā nisevanā saṃsevanā bhajanā sambhajanā bhatti sambhatti sampavaṅkatā—
pp2.2:33.3: Idhekacco puggalo cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī;
pp2.2:33.4: yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ, tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjati, rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjati.
pp2.2:33.9: manasā dhammaṃ viññāya na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī;
pp2.2:33.10: yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ manindriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ, tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjati, rakkhati manindriyaṃ, manindriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjati.
pp2.2:33.11: Yā imesaṃ channaṃ indriyānaṃ gutti gopanā ārakkho saṃvaro—
pp2.2:33.13: Imāya indriyesu guttadvāratāya samannāgato puggalo “indriyesu guttadvāro”.
pp2.2:34.3: Idhekacco puggalo paṭisaṅkhā yoniso āhāraṃ āhāreti—
pp2.2:34.4: “neva davāya, na madāya, na maṇḍanāya, na vibhūsanāya;
pp2.2:34.5: yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā yāpanāya vihiṃsūparatiyā brahmacariyānuggahāya.
pp2.2:34.6: Iti purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmi, navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmi, yātrā ca me bhavissati anavajjatā ca phāsuvihāro cā”ti.
pp2.2:34.7: Yā tattha santuṭṭhitā mattaññutā paṭisaṅkhā bhojane—
pp2.2:34.9: Imāya bhojane mattaññutāya samannāgato puggalo “bhojane mattaññū”.
pp2.2:35.3: Yā sati anussati paṭissati sati saraṇatā dhāraṇatā apilāpanatā asammussanatā sati satindriyaṃ satibalaṃ sammāsati—
pp2.2:36.3: Yā paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā paṇḍiccaṃ kosallaṃ nepuññaṃ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṃ patodo paññā paññindriyaṃ paññābalaṃ paññāsatthaṃ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṃ amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi—
pp2.2:37.3: Kāyiko avītikkamo vācasiko avītikkamo kāyikavācasiko avītikkamo—
pp2.2:38.3: “Atthi dinnaṃ, atthi yiṭṭhaṃ, atthi hutaṃ, atthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko, atthi ayaṃ loko, atthi paro loko, atthi mātā, atthi pitā, atthi sattā opapātikā, atthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sammaggatā sammāpaṭipannā ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī”ti.
pp2.2:38.4: Yā evarūpā paññā pajānanā …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi—
pp2.2:39.2: Yo ca pubbakārī, yo ca kataññū katavedī—
pp2.2:40.2: Yo ca laddhaṃ laddhaṃ nikkhipati, yo ca laddhaṃ laddhaṃ vissajjeti—
pp2.2:41.2: Yo ca laddhaṃ laddhaṃ na nikkhipati, yo ca laddhaṃ laddhaṃ na vissajjeti—
pp2.2:42.2: Yo ca na kukkuccāyitabbaṃ kukkuccāyati, yo ca kukkuccāyitabbaṃ na kukkuccāyati—
pp2.2:43.1: Katamesaṃ dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ āsavā na vaḍḍhanti?
pp2.2:43.2: Yo ca na kukkuccāyitabbaṃ na kukkuccāyati, yo ca kukkuccāyitabbaṃ kukkuccāyati—
pp2.2:43.3: imesaṃ dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ āsavā na vaḍḍhanti.
pp2.2:44.2: Idhekacco puggalo dussīlo hoti pāpadhammo, so aññaṃ dussīlaṃ pāpadhammaṃ sevati bhajati payirupāsati—
pp2.2:45.2: Idhekacco puggalo sīlavā hoti kalyāṇadhammo, so aññaṃ sīlavantaṃ kalyāṇadhammaṃ sevati bhajati payirupāsati—
pp2.2:46.2: Paccekasambuddhā ye ca tathāgatassa sāvakā arahanto tittā.
